about: Software developer, studying Information Systems, passionate about technology and innovation.

formation1.title: Bachelor of Information Systems
formation1.description: I'm currently studying Information Systems at IFMG, where I am acquiring knowledge in software development, database management, and system analysis.

items.title: DicioCode
items.description: The DicioCode project aims to create an innovative application that assists newcomers in programming, functioning as a dictionary of English focused on studies. Our mission is to facilitate the learning of technical terms, providing a friendly and efficient experience for those starting in the world of programming.

items.title: Pizzaria Dona Vilma
items.description: Where each slice is made with love and tradition. Enjoy our artisanal pizzas, prepared with the freshest ingredients and a special touch that only Dona Vilma knows how to create.

items.title: Busca CEP
items.description: A simple and efficient application that allows you to search for postal codes in Brazil. With an intuitive interface, you can quickly find the information you need.

items.title: TechDev Blog
items.description: A blog dedicated to technology and development.
